name: WindowsServiceManager
description: Deploys a Windows Service with an Agent or a Deployment Group Target.
author: MDSolutions

inputs.name: DeploymentType
inputs.label: Deployment Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deploy with an Agent or a Deployment Group.

inputs.name: Machines
inputs.label: Machines
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a comma separated list of machine IP addresses or FQDNs. Or provide output variable of other tasks. Eg: $(variableName).

inputs.name: AdminLogin
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator login for the target machines.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for administrator login for the target machines. It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'. You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: ServiceName
inputs.label: Service Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the windows service installed on the deployment group target.

inputs.name: ArtifactPath
inputs.label: Artifact Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the windows service artifact.

inputs.name: TimeOut
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of seconds to wait for the service to stop.

inputs.name: StopProcess
inputs.label: Stop Process
inputs.helpMarkDown: Stops the process if the service does not respond within the timeout limit.

inputs.name: CleanInstall
inputs.label: Clean Install
inputs.helpMarkDown: Deletes all files from the Windows Service parent directory prior to deployment of the artifact.
